page.title: 08COAST VIEW COUNTRY CLUB 3
page.content: 11.If you could change, build or add on to your business what would you do? I would like to open 2 discos to cater for all age groups. I would like to keep open all year round. 12.Do you see the business expanding? Only in a limited way as there are fears that buildings would break the skyline. I3.Do you employ local people or outsides on your staff? We employ only local people and 95% of them worked here last year. 14.Do you think the area benefits from having your business in it? Yes I think it does because local rates for residents would go up. 15.Do you enjoy your job? Yes, even though I work 96 hours a week and I have had no day off since Easter. During winter I decorate the camp and go on training courses.
